description: Total number of doubly-even self-dual binary codes of length 8n.
references: F. J. MacWilliams and N. J. A. Sloane, The Theory of Error-Correcting Codes, Elsevier-North Holland, 1978, p. 631.
mathematica: Join[{1},Table[2*Product[2^i+1,{i,4n-2}],{n,6}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 08 2013 *)Table[Product[2^i + 1, {i, 0, n/2 - 2}], {n, 8, 40, 8}] (* _Nathan J. Russell_, Mar 04 2016 *)
prog: (PYTHON) for n in range(8,50,8):        product = 1        for i in range(0,n/2-2 + 1):            product *= (2**i+1)        print product# _Nathan J. Russell_, Mar 01 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: There is an error in Eq. (75) of F. J. MacWilliams and N. J. A. Sloane, the lower subscript should be 1 not 0.
Formula corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 07 2013 following a suggestion from _Harvey P. Dale_
